project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Introductions & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish the SRE's responsibilities on Orion Edge Gateway and their security-relevant scope.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your day-to-day responsibilities on the Orion Edge Gateway?
How does your SRE role intersect with security requirements in this project?
What SLAs or SLOs are you directly accountable for?

sections.title: Gateway Architecture & Security Posture
sections.goal: Understand the current architecture, security controls, and integration points for authentication and MTLS.
sample_questions: Describe the Orion Edge Gateway's architecture from an SRE perspective.
How is MTLS implemented and monitored in production?
What runbooks exist for MTLS handshake failures?

sections.title: Incident Handling & Runbook Use
sections.goal: Assess how incidents have been managed, referencing specific tickets and runbooks.
sample_questions: Can you recall a recent incident and how RB-GW-011 factored into your resolution?
What was the root cause in GW-4821 and how did you mitigate it?
How do you ensure lessons learned are folded back into runbooks?

sections.title: Multi-Subsystem Dependencies
sections.goal: Explore dependencies between Orion Edge Gateway and other systems like Aegis IAM or Poseidon Networking.
sample_questions: How does Orion Edge Gateway depend on Aegis IAM for auth?
What coordination is required with Poseidon Networking for mTLS policy changes?
Have you experienced cascading failures due to upstream IAM issues?

sections.title: Risk Assessment & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Evaluate how the SRE balances performance SLAs with security hardening.
sample_questions: How do you balance SLA-ORI-02 latency targets with stricter mTLS cipher suites?
Have you ever had to choose between availability and strict policy enforcement?
What evidence or metrics guide those decisions?

sections.title: Closing & Future Improvements
sections.goal: Wrap up with forward-looking improvements and security posture evolution.
sample_questions: What improvements are planned for Orion Edge Gateway's security posture?
How would you evolve RB-GW-011 to handle more complex failover scenarios?
What are your top risks for the next 12 months?
